name: Knight Dice
description:
Knight Dice is a turn-based dice game, where your and enemies act depend on the dice. In every fight you and your enemy roll the dice, you can react to the situation with recalling some of your dice. Dice contains offensive and defensive pages, so you can react to enemy action with the right choice. Dice are also upgradable as a reward, and with the right combinations you can also cast powerful spell which helps in you in the battle.

Features:
▪ Turn-based strategy
▪ Relaxing music and graphics
▪ Easy to learn
▪ Lots of dice
